*Calcule, usando o Bootsrap, o erro padrão da acurácia  do modelo de classificação abaixo.*

*\## Bootstrap SVM*

*library(e1071)*

*data("iris")*

*model \<- svm(Species \~ ., data = iris)*

*pred \<- fitted(model)*

*class.table \<- table(pred, iris\$Species)*

*class.table*

*accuracy \<- sum(diag(class.table))/sum(class.table)*

*accuracy*

```{r}


#install.packages("e1071")
library(e1071)
View(iris)
#view("iris")
data(iris)

# Species ~ . separa a coluna Species de todas as outras
model <- svm(Species ~ ., data = iris)

summary(model)

pred <- fitted(model)

View(pred)

class.table <- table(pred, iris$Species)

View(class.table)

accuracy <- sum(diag(class.table))/sum(class.table)

accuracy

#confusion_matrix <- table(Predicted = pred, Actual = iris$Species)

```
